thread.title: Netflix Is Purging a TON of TV in April
thread.title_full: Netflix Is Purging a TON of TV in April

author: Maggie Pehanick
title: Netflix Is Purging a TON of TV in April
text:
Movies Leaving Netflix in April 2017 Netflix Is Purging a TON of TV in April March 22, 2017 5 Shares Chat with us on Facebook Messenger. Learn what's trending across POPSUGAR. 
The time has come. Netflix has announced the titles it's pulling from its catalog in April, and it's a staggering list. There are a handful of movies leaving, but it's really the TV shows that have us devastated. Multiple seasons of Buffy the Vampire Slayer , Bones , House, M.D. , and Ally McBeal will all disappear into the night. At least there are new shows and movies coming to comfort us, but this is still pretty depressing. Expiring April 1 
Ally McBeal , seasons one to five Angel , seasons one to five Better Off Ted , season one Barbershop 2: Back in Business Bones , seasons one to four Buffy the Vampire Slayer , seasons one to seven Chaplin
